statements: SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT experiment_name, scientist_name FROM experiments
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE scientist_name = 'Alice'
SELECT scientist_name, experiment_name, end_date FROM experiments ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_name
SELECT id, experiment_name, scientist_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE scientist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT experiment_name, start_date FROM experiments WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT scientist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_experiments FROM experiments GROUP BY scientist_name;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT experiment_name, scientist_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND scientist_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY scientist_name, start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments
SELECT result_value, result_date FROM results
SELECT experiment_name, result_date FROM experiments INNER JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id
SELECT experiment_name, result_value FROM experiments LEFT JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE researcher_id = 2;
SELECT experiment_name, result_value FROM experiments JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id;
SELECT result_id, result_value FROM results WHERE result_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM experiments JOIN results ON experiments.experiment_id = results.experiment_id WHERE result_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM labs;
SELECT lab_id, lab_name FROM labs WHERE lab_location = 'New York';
SELECT exp_name, sample_name FROM experiments JOIN samples ON experiments.exp_id = samples.exp_id;
SELECT lab_name, lab_location FROM labs ORDER BY lab_location DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM samples ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT lab_id, lab_name, lab_location FROM labs;
SELECT exp_id, exp_name, lab_id FROM experiments ORDER BY exp_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM samples WHERE exp_id = 1;
SELECT lab_id, lab_name, lab_location FROM labs WHERE lab_location = 'Lab A';
SELECT lab_id, lab_name, lab_location FROM labs JOIN experiments ON labs.lab_id = experiments.lab_id WHERE experiments.exp_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM labs;
SELECT lab_id, lab_name FROM labs WHERE lab_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE lab_id = 2 ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE sample_id = 3 AND experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(result_value) AS average_result FROM results WHERE experiment_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM labs;
SELECT lab_name, lab_id FROM labs ORDER BY lab_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_name FROM samples JOIN experiments ON samples.sample_id = experiments.sample_id WHERE experiments.experiment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(result_id) AS total_results, AVG(result_value) AS avg_result_value FROM results GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING AVG(result_value) > 50;
SELECT * FROM Scientists ORDER BY scientist_id ASC;
SELECT name, specialization FROM Scientists WHERE specialization IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Experiments WHERE scheduled_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, description FROM Experiments ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT name, joined_date FROM Scientists WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Scientists;
SELECT name, specialization FROM Scientists WHERE specialization = 'Chemistry';
SELECT experiment_id, title, scheduled_date FROM Experiments ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT Samples.sample_type, Samples.quantity, Experiments.title FROM Samples LEFT JOIN Experiments ON Samples.sample_id = Experiments.experiment_id;
SELECT Results.result_id, Results.result_data, Experiments.title FROM Results INNER JOIN Experiments ON Results.experiment_id = Experiments.experiment_id WHERE Results.result_data -> 'value' > 50;
